MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the ML12 postcode area of Biggar, affecting properties in Cormiston and surrounding areas. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 8:00pm this is to replace a faulty transformer in the area and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 10:00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 6:23pm on Monday, 14 December 2020
